entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse ALL I CAN SAY: I FEEL SORRY FOR PRESIDENT TRUMP. HE TRIED HIS BEST, SO MUCH TO SAVE ALL AMERICANS. HOWEVER, EVILS LIKE THE MEDIA AND SOME OTHERS, THEY ALWAYS TWIST THE TRUTH. COVID19 GETS ATTRACTTED TO LIARS, EVILS AND GREEDY PEOPLE. PLEASE GOD SAVE THE GOOD PEOPLE & THE WORLD.
